basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello I am Tiffani Rice, a resident of the greater Seattle area, with 7 years of experience in the aviation industry specializing in project coordination and customer support. In February 2023, I decided to switch gears and pursue a formal education in software development because I wanted a career that would give me continuous challenges on a day to day basis, and stand the test of time! My experience in bringing people together in order to solve problems under pressure, my ability to create environments of inclusion, and my dedication to creating accessible and sustainable programs  are the reasons you should want me on your team. In my spare time, I enjoy listening to debate and true crime podcasts, staying in touch with my culinary side by attempting new meals with my family and spending time at the dog park with my husky, Ghost!

projects.title: TheLazyTravelers
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with, in a team environment at Code Fellows. This application allows users to view vaious vacation images, and vote on their favorite spot! Once voting as commenced, the user will be able to view details on the location, as well as information on how to book a flight and rent a hotel in that area.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Personal study project for Code Fellows that allows a user to vote 25 times on a favorite novelty product, after which a chart will render detailing their top choices.

projects.title: 301 Project
projects.description: A project to be announced in the coming weeks
